To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Defending the Maximals!
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Tantrum gets the full brunt of the kick in his head, and is sent into the
air with the momentum of the huge robots kick. Like a large football, he
spirals toward the ground, leaving a large crater. He pulls himself out,
one of his horns was cracked, but he didnt care, he was kicked in the head,
the strongest place in his body, and now he was M...A....D. He spat oil on
the ground, rubbed his hoof against it, and set out in another charge
towards Lavatron.
